Package com.example.hashcache.models.database

Class DatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.example.hashcache.models.database.DatabaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabasePort
    public class DatabaseAdapter
extends java.util.Observable
implements DatabasePort
    The PlayerDatabase class represents a database of players that can be interacted with. It implements the IPlayerDatabase interface which defines the methods that can be performed on the database.
